headline: Barclays Maintains Overweight Rating on Edison’s (EIX) Despite Mixed Q2 Results
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is one of the best defensive stocks to invest in according to analysts. Edison remains on analysts’ radar as a solid long-term utility play, although it ranks as the second-weakest performer in terms of year-to-date share price decline on this list. The company recently reaffirmed its confidence in meeting its 2025 earnings target, […]
